extends java.lang.Object

      • targetsFromTargetString

        public java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,AbstractCard> targetsFromTargetString(Player player,
                                                                                      Player playerEnemy,
                                                                                      Player targetPlayer,
                                                                                      int idTarget,
                                                                                      java.lang.String spellTarget)
        Returns a list of targets based on the String of a specific spell.
        Parameters:
        player - the player playing the spell
        playerEnemy - the enemy player that may be affected by the spell
        targetPlayer - the specific player impacted by the spell if specified
        idTarget - the specific target of the spell if specified
        spellTarget - the string detailing the potential targets of a given spell
        Returns:
        LinkedHashMap containing the targets of the spell
